key_risks: Interest rate sensitivity due to floating-rate loans
Regulatory scrutiny as a Business Development Company
Market volatility in the middle-market lending environment
Reliance on leverage amplifying risks during downturns
controversies: Lawsuits related to investment products, including allegations of misrepresentation and suitability issues
Periodic dividend adjustments signaling potential variability in shareholder returns
social_issues: Investor lawsuits eroding trust and causing reputational damage
governance_issues: Dependency risk due to reliance on KKR’s network
Cybersecurity oversight by the Audit Committee
